citations.narrative:
The outdoor pen housing 2 goats, 3 sheep, and 2 pigs had a wooden platform with legs (resembling a table) that the
animals can climb up on. One of the boards in the floor had broken off, the broken edge of the board was jagged, and the
missing section of board resulted in a gap in the floor approximately 3” wide by 12” in length. The gap in the floor of the
platform could cause an injury to the feet/legs/hooves of the animals from a leg falling through and/or getting entrapped in
the gap.
Per this Section, outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the
animals from injury. The Licensee needs to make repairs to or remove/replace the wooden platform. Correct by 4/5/23.
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with facility representatives.
*END OF REPORT*
End Section
